meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Austin Rogers Tina Doppler Dennis Fawcett Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7597.

td.p: Austin Rogers, a bartender from New York, New York
Tina Doppler, a small business owner from Crown Point, Indiana
Dennis Fawcett, a painter and handyman from San Diego, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,000)

tr.td: 18th CENTURY AMERICA
ENTERTAINMENT AWARDS
FOOD STUFF
DOUBLE DOUBLE LETTERS
CAPITAL CITIES
MISREMEMBERED HARRY POTTER BOOK TITLES
(Alex: We don't want the title that you know. We want the title that fits our clue.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: The character supplies James with all of his weaponry, his gadgets and his stuff.)
...
(Alex: [To Austin] Came up with the letter [*] for "quartermaster". Supplying James Bond.)
DennisWhat is M? Thank you!
$2,564
TinaWhat is M?
$600
AustinWhat is Q?
$10,000
Q')
